channel.title: Links Page
channel.description:
So I want a Links page, once you fill in the form their link will be inserted into the page they choose on the category drop down menu, anyway this can be done? Layout: [code]Links Page Here at Ruddy Duck we welcome other similar sites to partner with us, if you would like to see your website or business listed on Ruddy Duck please complete the simple form. Title TEXT FIELD Website URL TEXT FIELD Category DROP DOWN MENU Brief Description TEXT FIELD SUBMIT BUTTON [u][b]Categories[/b][/u] Directory Financial General News [/code] code: [code]

Links Page

Here at Ruddy Duck we welcome other similar sites to partner with us, if you would like to see your website or business listed on Ruddy Duck please complete the simple form.

Title
Website URL
Category
Brief Description

[/code]

item.title: Links Page
item.dc:creator: @Kimber Kimber
item.description:
@Kimber wrote:

So I want a Links page, once you fill in the form their link will be inserted into the page they choose on the category drop down menu, anyway this can be done?

Layout:

[code]Links Page

Here at Ruddy Duck we welcome other similar sites to partner with us, if you would like to see your website or business listed on Ruddy Duck please complete the simple form.

Title TEXT FIELD
Website URL TEXT FIELD
Category DROP DOWN MENU
Brief Description TEXT FIELD

SUBMIT BUTTON

Categories
Directory
Financial
General
News
[/code]

code:

<table width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="10" cellspacing="10" class="whtbckgnd">
    <tr>
      <td class="whtbckgnd"><h3 align="justify" class="title"><strong><u>Links  Page</u></strong></h3>
        <p align="justify">Here at <a href="index.php">Ruddy Duck</a> we welcome other  similar sites to partner with us, if you would like to see your website or  business listed on <a href="index.php">Ruddy Duck</a> please complete the simple form.</p>
        <table width="33%" border="0">
          <tr>
            <td width="50%">Title</td>
            <td width="50%"><form id="form1" name="form1" method="post" action="">
              <label>
              <input name="title" type="text" id="title" />
                </label>
            </form>            </td>
          </tr>
          <tr>
            <td>Website URL</td>
            <td><input name="websiteurl" type="text" id="websiteurl" /></td>
          </tr>
          <tr>
            <td>Category</td>
            <td>   <select name="category">
                                  <option value="NA">- Select -</option>
                                  <option value="directory">Directory</option>
                                  <option value="financial">Financial</option>
                                  <option value="general">General</option>
                                  <option value="news">News</option>
            </select></td>
          </tr>
          <tr>
            <td>Brief Description</td>
            <td><input name="description" type="text" id="description" /></td>
          </tr>
        </table>
        <p>
          <input name="submit" type="submit" id="submit" value="Submit" />
        </p>

Read full topic
